Articles.Content:
Whenever I have GPP installed, the game takes an extremely long time to load. Is there anything I can do?

Edited February 5, 2017 by Omegagoldfish

There is a lot that needs to load when using GPP. The time it takes to load is dependent on a lot of things. What are the specs of your rig?

also post your logs and a screenshot of your gamedata folder. I can take a look and see if other things are at play here.
